items.sentence: I\'d do almost anything in the world for you.
I\'d like to improve my French pronunciation.
I\'ll do whatever it takes to make you happy.
Yesterday I played tennis for the first time.
I don\'t yet know what we\'re supposed to do.
Why do you think Tom didn\'t want to do that?
Why do you think Tom wasn\'t at school today?
Half the apples that Tom gave me were rotten.
Have you been told where the meeting will be?
Have you ever seen a spider spinning its web?
Have you read any interesting books recently?
Have you wrapped all your Christmas presents?
Both of those students didn\'t pass the test.
Can\'t you just be happy and enjoy the party?
There\'s a meeting going on in the next room.
I\'d like some coffee if you are making some.
I\'d like to get married to someone like you.
I\'d like to reserve a table for four at six.
I\'d like to thank Tom for everything he did.
I\'ll be in Australia for another three days.
I\'m not crazy. You\'re the one who\'s crazy.
Let\'s see what you\'ve got in your suitcase.
When was the last time you saw Tom at school?
When was the last time you traveled by train?
When was the last time you used a microscope?
When was the last time you visited Australia?
When was the last time you went to Australia?
When was the last time you went to the beach?
A learning disability may teach perseverance.
A chain is no stronger than its weakest link.
A man whose wife is dead is called a widower.
Autumn is the best season for going on hikes.
Be sure to put out the fire before you leave.
Broccoli is one of the healthiest vegetables.
I really don\'t want the kids left alone now.
I really wish I knew why Tom didn\'t like me.
I took it for granted that you would join us.
I tried to get that done before you got here.
I used to work for a small company in Boston.
I usually do my shopping at this supermarket.
Tom took Mary\'s hands and held them tightly.
I thought that you were able to speak French.
I thought the company had sent Tom to Boston.
I thought you and Tom were dating each other.
I thought you enjoyed talking about baseball.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all live in Boston.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice came here together.
Tom doesn\'t know anything about electronics.
Tom doesn\'t let Mary go shopping by herself.
Tom doesn\'t really care if his car is dirty.
Tom doesn\'t speak French as fluently as you.
If we\'d taken that plane, we\'d be dead now.
There\'s no point in getting upset over this.
There\'s not enough space here for 40 people.
I wonder why the police didn\'t find the gun.
I would hate to be in Tom\'s shoes right now.
I\'d like it if you would cook dinner for me.
I suppose we could try to find Tom ourselves.
I suppose you want to ask Tom some questions.
We have to just keep doing what we\'re doing.
We have to make sure we\'re ready to do that.
I\'ll look after your dog while you\'re away.
The actress looks younger than she really is.
The cathedral was destroyed by an earthquake.
The flowers in the garden need to be watered.
I assume you know there are no classes today.
I\'ve never heard Tom speaking French before.
I\'ve never made this kind of mistake before.
I\'ve never met anyone quite like you before.
I\'ve never seen him really get down to work.
I\'ve never stolen anything in my whole life.
I\'ve put on a lot of weight since Christmas.
Mary asked me to pretend to be her boyfriend.
Mary changes her nail color almost every day.
Mary has never ever been asked out on a date.
Mary is in love with the boy with blond hair.
Mary is waiting for her husband to come home.
What\'s the tallest mountain you\'ve climbed?
Tom asked Mary to marry him, but she refused.
Tom believes Mary is trying to discredit him.
Tom burned all the letters Mary had sent him.
Tom didn\'t know that the deadline was today.
Tom didn\'t know what Mary wanted him to buy.
Tom didn\'t know what Mary wanted him to say.
Tom didn\'t know what Mary was talking about.
Tom didn\'t like it, but he bought it anyway.
Tom didn\'t like spinach when he was a child.
Tom knows where to go to get the best prices.
Tom lied to you about having lived in Boston.
Tom locked eyes with Mary for a brief moment.
Tom lost his footing and fell into the water.
There\'s a problem there that you don\'t see.
Tom doesn\'t know why Mary doesn\'t eat meat.
Tom doesn\'t know why Mary isn\'t here today.
I was told that it\'s dangerous to swim here.
I wasn\'t aware that you were feeling so bad.
I wasn\'t sure whether Tom was joking or not.
I wasn\'t talking about anyone in particular.
I wasn\'t the one who called you. It was Tom.
Let us know when you\'ll be coming to Boston.
